definition: involving the entire earth, all of the living human inhabitants of the earth
details:
adjective
- involving the entire earth
= synonyms: worldwide
noun
- all of the living human inhabitants of the earth
= example: all of the living human inhabitants of the earth
= synonyms: man
- the concerns of this life as distinguished from heaven and the afterlife
= example: the concerns of this life as distinguished from heaven and the afterlife
= synonyms: earth, worldly concern, earthly concern
- all of one's experiences that determine how things appear
= example: all of one's experiences that determine how things appear
= synonyms: reality
- people in general
= synonyms: domain
- people in general considered as a whole
= synonyms: public
- the 3rd planet from the sun
= synonyms: globe, earth
- everything that exists anywhere
= synonyms: creation
- a part of the earth that can be considered separately
= example: a part of the earth that can be considered separately
